title: Tutorial: How to create st ligature in FontCreator 5.6
content:
1. Click the ellipse button at the drawing toolbar.  
2. Select the circle.  
3. Cut contours with the knife tool.  
4. Click Get union of contours.  
5. Remove off-curve extremes and reductant points using the "Validation toolbar."  
6. Cut off contours.

That helped!
author: 386sky
